description: This file defines a workflow for fetching top stories from Hacker News, generating a report, and formatting it as a news article. It includes classes and methods for retrieving data from Hacker News API, processing articles, and producing a structured report.

classes.name: HackerNewsReporter
classes.description: A workflow class that fetches top Hacker News stories, generates a detailed report, and formats it for presentation.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News API and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow: retrieves top stories, generates a report, and yields formatted responses.
